make_mlp_model[source]

make_mlp_model(latent_size, num_layers, activate_final=True)

Instantiates a new MLP, followed by LayerNorm.

The parameters of each new MLP are not shared with others generated by this function.

Returns: A Sonnet module which contains the MLP and LayerNorm.
